name: Web Design
description: Creating visually appealing and user-friendly website layouts, focusing on aesthetics, UX/UI, and branding.

name: Web Development
description: Building and maintaining websites or web applications using front-end and back-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side frameworks.

name: Marketing
description: Promoting products or services through digital channels like SEO, social media, email campaigns, and paid advertising to reach target audiences.

name: Writing
description: Creating content for various purposes including blogs, articles, copywriting, technical documentation, and storytelling.

name: Graphics Design
description: Designing visual content such as logos, posters, infographics, and digital assets using tools like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
